DOC.brief_summary: The immunogenicity simultaneous administration quadrivalent influenza vaccine pneumococcal vaccine unknown . The purpose present study compare immunogenicity simultaneous administration influenza vaccine pneumococcal vaccine separate administration .
DOC.brief_title: The Immunogenicity Simultaneous Administration Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine 23-valent Pneumococcal Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: The immunogenicity simultaneous administration quadrivalent influenza vaccine pneumococcal vaccine unknown . We compare immunogenicity simultaneous administration quadrivalent influenza vaccine pneumococcal vaccine separate administration . 162 Participants randomly assign one two study group ; Simultaneous administration group : receive injection pneumococcal vaccine influenza vaccine simultaneously . Sequential administration group : receive injection pneumococcal vaccine 2 week injection influenza vaccine . We compare immunogenicity two group .
